calculation_logic.abstract: Ensures every high-risk AI recruitment recommendation has a corresponding reviewer_id and timestamp before finalization.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT decision_id FROM ai_recommendations WHERE risk_level = 'High' AND (reviewer_id IS NULL OR review_timestamp IS NULL)

calculation_logic.abstract: Checks that protected attributes (race, religion, health) are not passed as features directly to the model training pipeline.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'model_training_input' AND column_name IN ('race', 'religion', 'sexual_orientation', 'disability_status')

calculation_logic.abstract: Ensures every candidate processed by an AI system has signed a specific disclosure consent form.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT applicant_id FROM applicants WHERE processed_by_ai = TRUE AND ai_disclosure_accepted = FALSE

calculation_logic.abstract: Verify that training data distribution for age groups does not deviate more than 10% from the actual labor market census data.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT age_group, ABS(training_pct - market_pct) as variance FROM age_distribution_audit WHERE variance > 0.10
